name: Lexus LS
description: The price of Lexus LS, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 1.96  - 2.27 Crore. It is available in 4 variants, with an engine of 3456 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. LS comes with 14 airbags. Lexus LS has a ground clearance of 147 mm  and is available in 10 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 15.4 kmpl for LS.

variants.variant_name: LS 500h Luxury 3456 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 15.4 kmpl, 292 bhp
